text: The Ministry of Culture and National Heritage is a ministry of the Polish government led by the Minister of Culture and National Heritage. It is responsible for national heritage preservation and Polish culture. Ministry oversees state or partially state cultural institutions and implements the law regarding art and cultural property. The headquarters are located at Potocki Palace, in Warsaw. The minister has been Hanna Wr√≥blewska since May 2024. ==References== Category:Polish culture Category:Government of Poland
title: Ministry of Culture and National Heritage (Poland)
